author: rbb
msg: Fix the problem of choosing the wrong locking mechanism on some
machines.  SYSVSEM should be the last option chosen.

author: dreid
msg: More relics from the early days of APR that have no place in the modern
world!  This gets BeOS responding correctly to signals again.
